questions.question_text: Jabber for iOS is which Device Name?
A network administrator finds directory number 77555 in the <none> partition. Which numbers can reach 77555 in this situation?

choices.C: Only internal directory numbers can reach 77555.
choices.A: Only numbers in the <none> partition can reach 77555.
choices.B: All numbers in every calling search space can reach 77555.
choices.D: Directory number 77555 cannot be reached by any number.
